description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Suuey is a 2D arcade game for family fun! Players take control of a lonely pig on his quest to gain barnyard fame... by eating as much as possible! Pig out against up to 3 other players on your local xbox!
description.short: Suuey is a 2D arcade game for family fun! Players take control of a lonely pig on his quest to gain barnyard fame... by eating as much as possible! Pig out against up to 3 other players on your local xbox!
